member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.LoggerConfigurationExtensions

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySink
member.summary: Writes log events to the Unity Console.
member.param: A formatter, such as , to convert the log events into text for the Unity Console.
The Unity backing this sink. If then the default will be used.

The Unity backing this sink. If then the default will be used.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySinkSettings.UnityTagLogProperty
member.summary: Name of the storing the Unity log's tag, if present. If , then will not check the for a tag. This property can be removed from s by setting to to avoid duplicating its value in the log message (recommended). See Unity's Logger.Log docs for a description of the tag parameter.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySinkSettings.UnityContextLogProperty
member.summary: Name of the storing the Unity log's context, if present. If , then will not check the for a context. This property can be removed from s by setting to to avoid trying to format instances stored in the context property (recommended). See Unity's Debug.Log docs for a description of the context parameter.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySinkSettings.RemoveUnityTagLogPropertyIfPresent
member.summary: Whether the storing the Unity log's tag (the property with the name given by ) will be removed from s. Set to to avoid duplicating that property's value between the log's tag in the Unity Console and the formatted log message itself. See Unity's Logger.Log docs for a description of the tag parameter.

member.name: P:Serilog.Sinks.Unity.UnitySinkSettings.RemoveUnityContextLogPropertyIfPresent
member.summary: Whether the storing the Unity log's context (the property with the name given by ) will be removed from s. Set to to avoid trying to format instances stored in the context property. See Unity's Debug.Log docs for a description of the context parameter.
